Module no.ntnu.idatt1002
Package no.ntnu.idatt1002.dao

Interface UserDAO

All Superinterfaces:
DAO<User,Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
SqlUserDAO
public interface UserDAO extends DAO<User,Long>
This interface defines methods to interact with users and user related tasks.

      User authenticate(String username, String password) throws AuthException
      Authenticates a user with a given username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - the username
      password - the password
      Returns:
      the user with the specified username and password
      Throws:
      AuthException - if the password is invalid or the user is not found
